## CheckResourcesResponse.isAllowed() method

Check if the policy decision was that an action should be allowed for a resource.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isAllowed(check: {
        resource: ResourceSearch;
        action: string;
    }): boolean | undefined;
```

boolean \| undefined
